feature.label: JaMoPP - Java Model Parser and Printer (Eclipse JDT Integration)
feature.description: JaMoPP: Java Model Parser and Printer (EMFText-based Java support for EMF modelling tools). This feature enables JaMoPP to use the classpath configured in an Eclipse Java project.
